welcome_description: A social media app developed by students from IUT Paul Sabatier, made to promote ecological actions.
welcome_post: Post pictures of your ecological actions
welcome_acorns: Earn acorns and contribute to the virtual forest (coming soon)
welcome_quiz: Test your knowledge with our quizzes (coming soon)
change_username_description: This username will be visible to other users. It must be between 3 and 20 characters.
change_username_error_length: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters
